comment.author: 40779816@N06
comment._content: Beaverkill River (identifiable by the concrete bridge supports in background near approaching train).  Dangerous crossing clearly visible on NYO&W (prior to 1911.

comment.author: 32357722@N06
comment._content: When I saw these photos at Cornell in the late 1960s, this one was captioned that it is the crossing where Master Mechanic John Minshull died jumping from Inspection Engine 3.
